name: Rentable
authors: Tommy Flynn, Tawny Francis, Ajay Kiri, Justin Lampe
tech_used: HTML, CSS, Javascript, jQuery, Bootstrap, MySQL, JawsDB, Heroku, Zillow API, Google API
blurb: A full stack application designed to help people get started in the real estate market. Users can look up properties on Zillow and easily calculate ROI.  Must sign up to login and get started!

name: Only The Hits
authors: Tawny Francis, Justin Lampe, Jack Shalenkova, Liam Wynne
tech_used: HTML, CSS, Javascript, jQuery, Bootstrap, Spotify API, BandsInTown API
blurb: A front end application that leverages Spotify API to create new playlists made up of new music.  Feed it artists you love to find similar artists, peruse their top tracks, and add them to a new playlist in your Spotify account.

name: CRUD Burger
tech_used: HTML, CSS, Javascript, jQuery, node.js, express, MySQL
